description:
May 11, 2017 /  Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Marcia Chatelain, as well as guest panelists Major Neill Franklin and Sandra Guerra Thompson. 
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.

Thank you to our awesome sponsors!

www.Stamps.com use promo code UNDISCLOSED
